name: Conrad Dubai
description: Conrad Dubai in the United Arab Emirates is an incredible destination of choice for today’s smart luxury traveller. Located conveniently located in the hub of Dubai’s commercial centre on Sheikh Zayed Road, the property is a stylish city haven within close proximity to Dubai’s international financial and convention centre, one of the world’s fastest growing airport and world-class shopping destinations. The 555-room property is the perfect celebration of one of the world's favourite luxury cities and boasts locally inspired international design and tailor-made services to help each guest feel connected to their surroundings.

name: Hotel Riu Dubai
description: The All Inclusive 24h Hotel Riu Dubai opened its doors in September 2020 and is situated at Deira Islands, on the coast of the city of Dubai, directly on the beach. The RIU Classic Hotels offer comfortable rooms and excellent facilities with great leisure and relaxation facilities, as well as international gastronomy. Enjoy a relaxing holiday - whether alone, with family, partner or friends! The location is ideal because of its proximity to Dubai - Burj Khalifa (15 km) and Dubai International Airport (DXB) (11 km) and invites you to explore the area. The hotel has 787 comfortably furnished rooms with free WiFi and offers many amenities. Relax in our spa or get in shape at the gym. 3 outdoor pools, 2 children’s pools (1 of them with slides) and the “Splash Water World” water park. For the youngest guests, RiuLand kids' club (4-7 & 8-12 yrs), and for adults, day and evening entertainment. For lovers of gastronomy, live cooking stations and themed buffets at our main restaurant as well as Asian, Italian and Lebanese specialty restaurants; 6 bars.

name: Shangri-La Dubai
description: Shangri-La Dubai is an ideal starting point from which to discover the city’s dynamic energy. Strategically located on Sheikh Zayed Road, minutes away from The Dubai Mall, Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC) and City Walk, the hotel offers 302 spacious rooms and suites with stunning views of the Downtown Dubai skyline or the Arabian Sea. Asian-inspired dining options and a pool offering unobstructed views of the Burj Khalifa complete the experience.

name: Raffles Dubai
description: A stunning landmark hotel in a distinctive pyramid shape merges Asian style with an Egyptian aesthetic. Ideally located in the city center with a shopping adventure lies around the corner as Raffles Dubai adjoins Wafi mall, one of Dubai's most exclusive shopping and leisure destinations, home to hundreds of boutiques offering an extensive selection of international haute couture, jewelries and gifts in addition to nearby authentic souks, including the impressive Khan Murjan, offering traditional crafts by artisans from the region. Featuring 252 luxurious rooms and suites, this award-winning Dubai hotel offers some of the most spacious rooms in the city, each with generously-sized private balconies. Brilliant contemporary interiors, faultless service and 7 superb restaurants and bars offering an extensive array of dining, entertainment and clubbing options, while Raffles Spa beckons with a pampering menu to emerge transformed, like a lotus that journey from bud to the radiance of full bloom.

name: ME Dubai
description: Housed in the iconic Opus by Omniyat building in the Burj Khalifa district, ME Dubai stands out from the crowd. All 93 rooms and suites of ME Dubai are congruent with Dame Zaha Hadid’s signature Design. Her organic shapes, flowing in appearance, combine with geometric structures to create positive energy and a calming, serene mood. Rooms include a 65inch 4K LED TV, MaxiBar with coffee and tea making facilities, complimentary Wi-Fi, large bathroom with torrential rain shower and bathtub, plus state-of-the-art BOSE sound system. Regard ME Dubai as your ‘Lifestyle Concierge’, delivering bespoke à la carte or pre-selected services within your personal space, tailored to your personality. Whether you’re looking to immerse yourself in the country’s deep-rooted history or explore the emerging art and design scene, Dubai has something to offer for everyone. The pool will be closed until August 1st.

name: Palazzo Versace Dubai
description: Palazzo Versace Dubai is a neoclassical masterpiece with subtle traces of Arabian architecture. Featuring a striking entrance, high ceilings, landscaped gardens, and a range of well-crafted Italian furnishings, the hotel is truly symbolic of the Versace lifestyle. Every single piece of furniture and fabric that adorns the hotel's 215 hotel rooms and suites, and 169 residences, is designed and tailor-made by Versace. Each of the hotel's 8 restaurants and bars is designed to have an al fresco terrace to reflect the heritage of Palazzos. The hotel is 15 minutes away from the Airport and within 10 minutes of proximity to Downtown / Burj Khalifa, Dubai International Financial Center, Festival City Mall, and Dubai Mall. The beautifully landscaped gardens and the unobstructed views of the Dubai Creek and skyline make the hotel an ideal venue for weddings and social events.

name: W Dubai - The Palm
description: Situated on the sun-soaked island of Palm Jumeirah, W Dubai – The Palm boasts 349 guest rooms and suites, each with private balconies and views of either the Arabian Gulf or the captivating Dubai skyline. Bold colors, retro details, urban-inspired art and spa-style bathrooms define the design. Each room boasts inviting soaking tubs, spacious showers and indulgent bathroom amenities. Our vibrant Escape is also pet-friendly, so don’t forget to bring your furry friends along, too!

name: Taj Dubai
description: An inspiring blend of sophisticated luxury, authentic Indian heritage and contemporary style - Taj Dubai is a world-class destination. Taking prime position overlooking the prestigious Downtown and Burj Khalifa precinct, it puts you at the heart of where it happens: a five minute stroll from the city's dynamic business centre and a myriad of exclusive shopping and fine dining experiences. We are right by the Burj Khalifa - so from our luxurious suites you get to enjoy awe-inspiring views of the world's tallest building and its magical dancing fountain. And you are only a short walk away from the Dubai Mall, a fashionista's paradise boasting over 1,200 stores and trendsetting venues.

name: Rixos Premium Dubai JBR
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Dubai? Then look no further than Rixos Premium Dubai, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Dubai to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Rixos Premium Dubai features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Rixos Premium Dubai, free parking is available.
Close to some of Dubai's most popular landmarks, such as Flying Cup (0.3 mi) and Dubai Water Canal (0.6 mi), Rixos Premium Dubai is a great destination for tourists.
While in Dubai, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Rixos Premium Dubai, including Buddha-Bar (0.7 mi), Barasti Beach Bar (1.0 mi), and Observatory Bar & Grill (0.9 mi).
Best of all, Rixos Premium Dubai makes it easy to experience some great Dubai attractions like The Walk At JBR (0.3 mi), which is a short distance away.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Rixos Premium Dubai as you experience everything Dubai has to offer.

name: Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi
description: Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is an iconic architectural landmark that unites the very best of Arabic and Turkish culture, dining and hospitality. Located in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s retail, entertainment and residential hub, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is a multifaceted resort presiding over sparkling waters and a sandy shoreline. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi reflects the versatility of Abu Dhabi as both a cosmopolitan city abounding with enriching experiences and an archipelago with a rich natural and aquatic heritage. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi seamlessly fuses sophisticated aquatic and arabesque design to tell the story of Abu Dhabi from its ancient seafaring origins to a thriving cosmopolitan city that takes pride in its heritage and ultimate luxury experiences. As a destination, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi dares to be different, elevating guest experience through incredible design, amenities, ambience, gastronomy, entertainment, and leisure.

name: Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche
description: Opened in the first quarter 2012, the Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche (part of Capital Plaza building) is ideally situated in the heart of the city, close to the seafront and the business and financial center. It enjoys a privileged location on Corniche Road, one of the most prestigious district. The maritime centre Port Zayed, the Souk, famous for its rugs and Dhow Harbour, home to the traditional transport and fishing boats which still take to the waters of the Arabian Gulf, are all a short distance from the hotel. The hotel offers all the services of a world-class French establishment, blending its origins with the best of the Oriental influences: butler service and executive lounge access (Club Millesime) for club rooms and suites, and the famous MyBed concept and Bose wave in all rooms. Each of the rooms offer breathtaking views over city and Arabian Gulf. Additionally, the hotel offers 3 signature restaurants and 3 bars, a pool, a spa and wellness space and 9 meeting rooms. A ballroom can also welcome up to 1000 visitors and therefore host any kind of events.

name: Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi
description: Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi brings Thai-inspired design and hospitality to the heart of the United Arab Emirates' capital city. This 5-star luxury hotel is centrally located in Abu Dhabi's new business and government district, within easy reach of the Eastern Mangroves, the city's lush natural habitat the Corniche, the city's iconic seaside promenade and the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre. With its prominent glass tower, Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi presents a fresh and innovative architectural design. Inside, guest rooms and fully furnished extended stay executive apartments are infused with Thai elegance and modern conveniences. An array of exquisite restaurants (Thai, Indian, Irish sports bar & International cuisine) serve delicacies to satisfy any palate and a host of facilities and services, including Namm Spa and DFiT Fitness Centre, allow guests to nurture their minds and bodies.

name: Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort
description: Discover the newly renovated Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort located on the famous Corniche, with spurring 5 star hotels in the heart of the bustling Abu Dhabi metropolis. Experience comfort with afresh luxury hotel rooms including 2-bedroom hotel suites and family hotel rooms. Each room has a marble bathroom and a private balcony with views over the city or the Arabian Gulf, being a hotel with a beach. Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort serves a range of cuisine and a variety of dining venues including Le Bistrot, an international bistro, Tavern, the legendary British pub in Abu Dhabi, all-day dining buffet restaurant Flavours, and a pool bar. Unwind at hotel’s private beach or at the outdoor swimming pools, which are shaded by palm trees. Engage in an active lifestyle while on vacation with our fully equipped fitness center, squash and tennis court or relax at the brand-new spa. Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort is the destination of every occasion.

name: Pullman Sharjah
description: Immerse yourself in the UAE’s cultural capital. Located in the vibrant district of Al Taawun, Pullman Sharjah is a playground for creative explorers and business professionals alike. A short hop from Al Khan Bay, Al Qasba waterfront and Expo Centre Sharjah, it makes work and play a breeze. Sharjah International Airport and Dubai International Airport are both a short drive away. Arrive, check-in and let the hotel take care of the rest. With stylish rooms and suites that have it all in the heart of Sharjah, the hotel offers plenty of choice for those that want more from their stay. Settle into your new home away from home, watch the latest blockbusters on TV, stay connected with free Wi-Fi or dance to your own beat with handy wireless music stations in every room. Hungry for more? Our two restaurants and bar in Sharjah city centre will satisfy every appetite. Al Khan presents international specialities and live cooking stations, while The Junction serves up a fresh take on social dining. No sunshine-fueled day would be complete without a dip – the Infinity Pool Bar is a deliciously refreshing spot to enjoy light meals. Getting down to business has never been easier with hyper-connected meeting rooms, business services and event spaces that will inspire you. The hotel also takes the business of leisure seriously so you can work out with the best, or unwind with a signature spa ritual. Practice your stretch at the yoga deck and dive deep into the indoor or outdoor pool. There’s even a dedicated medical center with daycare surgery services so guests can make every moment count, all in one address. Pullman Sharjah is a place to inspire the mind and recharge the body in an enviable central Sharjah location.

name: Corniche Hotel Sharjah
description: On the banks of Sharjahs’ Khalid Lagoon, Corniche Hotel Sharjah is a 5-star hotel that features spacious rooms with views of the lagoon or Sharjah. Free on-site private parking is also available. The air-conditioned rooms at Corniche Hotel Sharjah feature modern, elegant décor. Each has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. Interconnecting rooms are available in the Deluxe Rooms and Suites. Buffet-style breakfasts and dinners are served at Mojo All Day Dining Restaurant, and authentic Iranian cuisine is served at Shiraz Restaurant. Guests can enjoy exotic cocktails in the lobby lounge. Corniche Hotel Sharjah has 2 temperature-controlled outdoor pools and steam rooms for men and women. Guests can also play a game of racquetball or work out in the gym. There is a separate children’s pool. Central Sharjah is just 10 minutes by car from the hotel. Dubai International Airport is a 20-minute drive from Corniche Hotel Sharjah.

Free private parking is available on site.

name: Novotel Fujairah
description: Novotel Fujairah is minutes away from the city's landmarks and shopping malls, welcoming every visitor to Fujairah. Our facilities radiate comfort and hospitality; airy, well designed rooms, outdoor pool overlooking Hajjar Mountains, balanced options in our restaurants and meeting rooms. Each room has an ergonomic work area, tea and coffee making facilities, separate bathtub and shower, complimentary WIFI connection that makes it easier to fully enjoy your stay. The hotel offers 182 stylish rooms, a restaurant, bar, coffee lounge and free indoor parking. Guests also enjoy the use of the gym and swimming pool. There are 5 fully equipped meeting rooms and Dibba Ballroom which can host up to 1000. Allowing families to share precious moments and happy memories has always been a priority for Novotel. Children under 16* may share your room and enjoy breakfast at no cost. Toys and games for younger and older children are available in hotel lobby. Fujairah is an emirate on the east coast of the United Arab Emirates, lying along the Gulf of Oman. It's known for its beaches and the Hajjar Mountains. A town full of culture and heritage and just an hour drive from Dubai.

name: Rixos Al Mairid Ras Al Khaimah Resort
description: Arabian adventure Every day is an adventure at Hilton Ras Al Khaimah Beach Resort. Take advantage of our hotel's proximity to unique experiences in Ras Al Khaimah and beyond. Explore the local fish and spice markets or visit the Jebel Jais mountain, the highest peak in the UAE. For physical activity, challenge yourself on the Via Ferrata or go desert driving and quad-biking. Take up the jet ski for adrenaline-packed Arabian adventure. The beach is a step away Watch the sunset over the Arabian Sea from a stylish room or a newly renovated villa at our Hilton beach resort. All rooms, suites, and villas feature internet access and a private balcony or patio. The Royal Suite offers a private steam room, sauna, and Turkish Hammam. A haven of relaxation Embrace the healing powers of the four elements with our range of rejuvenating treatments and tranquil spaces. The individual and couples treatment rooms are ideal for pampering body treatments, rejuvenating facials and blissful massages. Kid friendly As a family-friendly resort, our host of kids' facilities include indoor/outdoor playgrounds, swimming pools, water slide, a Teens Club and Kids Club. Culture in every bite Indulge in fine Italian cuisine at Piaceri de Gustare or authentic Arabian at our Lebanese restaurant Al Maeda. You'll also find mouth-watering cuts of churrasco. All of our nine exclusive outlets are ready to create the perfect dining experience for you and your family. Great for families A fantastic choice for a family stay, we have a great range of family rooms designed for children. From high chairs and kids menu in the restaurants, water slide, kids Club and outdoor playground to a lively Teens Club, we have it all for your little ones to be entertained.

description: Citymax Hotel Ras Al Khaimah is centrally located in the Al Nakheel area by the creek, just steps from the Free Trade Zone and RAK Exhibition Centre. Ras Al Khaimah Airport is 25 minutes away, and Dubai Airport is 70 minutes away. Citymax Hotel Ras Al Khaimah is perfectly located for exploring the city and its natural beauty. Choose from multiple food & beverage options such as The Huddle Sports Bar & Grill, Claypot restaurant, our all-day dining restaurant CityCafe, 24-hour Lavazza coffee shop and the Aqua Pool Bar. Whether you’re in town for leisure or work, we've got everything you need for a fun and cost-effective stay.

name: Anantara Mina Al Arab Ras Al Khaimah Resort
description: Ras Al Khaimah is where glamorous beach life meets adventures of the ocean, mountains and desert, and Anantara boasts one of the destination’s most enviable settings, a private peninsula of golden sands that overlooks lagoon then open ocean. name: Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel
description: Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel has earned its place through time as an iconic destination for leisure and business travelers in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. The hotel offers diverse dining choices in 7 restaurants, bars and lounges, all featuring international tastes that inspire. Make the most of your time in the city. Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel, where the world comes together.

name: Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi
description: Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is an iconic architectural landmark that unites the very best of Arabic and Turkish culture, dining and hospitality. Located in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s retail, entertainment and residential hub, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is a multifaceted resort presiding over sparkling waters and a sandy shoreline. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi reflects the versatility of Abu Dhabi as both a cosmopolitan city abounding with enriching experiences and an archipelago with a rich natural and aquatic heritage. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi seamlessly fuses sophisticated aquatic and arabesque design to tell the story of Abu Dhabi from its ancient seafaring origins to a thriving cosmopolitan city that takes pride in its heritage and ultimate luxury experiences. As a destination, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi dares to be different, elevating guest experience through incredible design, amenities, ambience, gastronomy, entertainment, and leisure.

name: Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche
description: Opened in the first quarter 2012, the Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche (part of Capital Plaza building) is ideally situated in the heart of the city, close to the seafront and the business and financial center. It enjoys a privileged location on Corniche Road, one of the most prestigious district. The maritime centre Port Zayed, the Souk, famous for its rugs and Dhow Harbour, home to the traditional transport and fishing boats which still take to the waters of the Arabian Gulf, are all a short distance from the hotel. The hotel offers all the services of a world-class French establishment, blending its origins with the best of the Oriental influences: butler service and executive lounge access (Club Millesime) for club rooms and suites, and the famous MyBed concept and Bose wave in all rooms. Each of the rooms offer breathtaking views over city and Arabian Gulf. Additionally, the hotel offers 3 signature restaurants and 3 bars, a pool, a spa and wellness space and 9 meeting rooms. A ballroom can also welcome up to 1000 visitors and therefore host any kind of events.

name: Al Haram Hotel - Al Rawda
description:
See why so many travelers make Al Haram Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Medina. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Al Haram Hotel. In addition, Al Haram Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Medina trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
While you’re here, be sure to check out Al Rawdha Restaurant, one of the seafood restaurants that can be found in Medina, which is a short distance from Al Haram Hotel.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Al-Masjid an-Nabawi (0.2 mi), Quba Mosque (0.7 mi), and Jannatul Baqi (0.6 mi), which are some popular Medina attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
At Al Haram Hotel, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Medina.

name: TUI BLUE Medina Gardens
description: Situated in the heart of Marrakesh 5 minutes walking from Jemaa El Fna square, ideal for couples desiring to soak up the charm of Marrakesh, most attractions are within walking distance, including the Palace Bahia, the Koutoubia Mosque, the Gueliz and the Majorelle Gardens. Spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains, the minaret of the Koutoubia and a lush garden of three hectares. This property combines modern comfort and traditional Moroccan accents. Our rooms and suites, carefully designed for the comfort of a luxury accommodation in Marrakesh. They are equipped with an LCD 32 inch TV with a wide selection of international channels, direct dial telephone, air conditioning / heating, mini bar (water and soft drinks), safe and free WiFi connection. The hotel includes 3 restaurants: Buffet Restaurant: a space resolutely modern design, a cuisine with miles and flavor in a warm atmosphere. Snack Restaurant: open only during lunch time. The Culinarium (A La Carte Restaurant): For an exceptional culinary experience, open only for dinner time. Dress code is to be followed : in the common areas no swimsuits in the covered areas (Lobby, restaurant, Lobby Bar and Lounge Bar). Restaurant at dinner: long trousers for the gentlemen, no casual flip-flops, no sportswear. The hotel Spa and pools invite to regenerate in peace, while the fitness center allows you to keep in shape. The property also boasts two tennis clay courts, ping pong table, escape room.

description: Discover a modern urban sanctuary in the heart of Kuwait City: a contemporary curation of Middle Eastern architecture, dazzling art and resort-like spaciousness, where striking sculptures seamlessly merge with traditional design. In this enclave of wonder - the first and only hotel in Kuwait to receive the prestigious Forbes Five-Star rating - you'll find soaring rooftop restaurants, leisure facilities and the city's largest guest rooms. Catch up with friends in the chic surrounds of Al Soor (known as La Chocolaterie of Kuwait), relax in air-conditioned cabanas by the infinity pool, ascend to a buzzing rooftop and wander the lush adjacent parkland. And with the city's malls and souks within a few minutes' drive, you can experience all the spoils of the city without spoiling your precious relaxation time.

description: Holiday Inn Kuwait Al Thuraya City: Comfort for Business & Leisure Welcome to the Holiday Inn Kuwait - ATC your stylish retreat just a seven-minute drive from Kuwait International Airport. Our hotel offers a warm embrace with 336 contemporary rooms, inspired by desert hues, providing stunning city views. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, family-friendly perks with our Kids Stay and Eat Free program, and easy access to attractions like the Kuwait Towers and Grand Mosque. Experience the luxury of our plush suites, featuring kitchenettes and whirlpool baths for a comfortable stay. For business travelers, seamless access to the Shuwaikh Industrial Area, oil and gas projects, and major banks is just a short car or taxi ride away. Shopaholics will delight in the proximity to The Avenues and 360 Mall, home to The Arena and the Rafael Nadal Academy. Take a break at our 24-hour Health Club or enjoy a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Bahrain
description: Within Bahrain’s capital, Manama, this luxury resort offers a secluded slice of paradise. Set along the bay in Seef, with a private lagoon and island, the resort provides guests with one temptation after another. Dining spans the globe, from Italy to India, the spa fuses traditional therapies and modern-day relaxation and beach time can transform into an afternoon of golf or tennis. Guests can design their perfect Gulf resort retreat with: Sea-inspired spa for ladies and gentlemen featuring a hammam with plunge pools, a couple’s suite and signature treatments drawing from Arabic rituals. 14 dining venues including the handsomely elegant Plums steakhouse, the vibrant Cantina Kahlo, the outdoor La Plage and the authentic Indian restaurant Nirvana. Complete meeting destination with venues including ballrooms and intimate villas, team-building programs, catering and planning services. Members-only Royal Beach Club with tennis and squash courts, a fitness center, temperature-controlled indoor and outdoor pools and kid-friendly activities. Royal Golf Club with an 18-hole, par 72 championship course that blends links and desert styles. Guest room, suite and villa accommodations, including those on the Club Level with access to the exclusive lounge and its additional services and amenities.

name: Sofitel Bahrain Zallaq Thalassa sea & spa
description: Sofitel Bahrain Zallaq Thalassa Sea & Spa offers guests a paradise setting to enjoy an idyllic stay with spectacular views over the Arabian Gulf. The hotel is an exclusive resort catering to both leisure and business travelers and offers the uniqueness of a luxurious location amidst views of the crystal clear turquoise waters of the Arabian Gulf. Sofitel Bahrain celebrates the Kingdom’s legendary hospitality with a French flair and is the first hotel within the GCC countries to offer the unique relaxation of Thalassotherapy. The Thalassa Sea & Spa at Sofitel Bahrain covers 2,000 square meters on two floors; the complex features 14 treatment rooms utilizing marine based products to offer a unique series of Thalassotherapy treatments, massages and wellness programmes. Guests of the Thalassa Sea & Spa can also enjoy a seawater hydrotherapy pool, a freshwater pool, saunas, steam rooms, a hairdresser for men and a beauty salon for women, as well as a Yoga & Pilates studio. Sofitel Bahrain offers 262 rooms and suites, combining comfort and elegance and offering lavish furnishings with breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf. Within the hotel are 28 suites including 21 Prestige Suites, 6 rooftop Opera suites each offering a private terrace and infinity pool and one Royal Suite complete with a Jacuzzi, private terrace, infinity pool and a uniquely regal design and furnishings. The hotel offers a large swimming pool complete with a swim-up pool bar situated adjacent to its private beach and 5 restaurants. Located on Zallaq Beach 5 minutes from the Bahrain International Circuit, 25 minutes from the heart of Manama and 30 minutes from the Bahrain International Airport, Sofitel Bahrain Zallaq Thalassa Sea & Spa offers the perfect location for a relaxed vacation away from the city or a luxurious vacation with convenient access to the city.

name: Crowne Plaza Manama (Bahrain)
description: An elegant Bahrain business hotel in central Manama, with excellent restaurants, a Club Lounge and versatile Conference Center facilities, Crowne Plaza Manama (Bahrain) is in the heart of Manama's diplomatic area, close to many embassies, banks and legal firms, as well as city-center shops, sights and the World Trade Center. Only 15 minutes by shuttle from Bahrain International Airport (BAH), we're an ideal base for professionals or families who are visiting Bahrain's capital. We're close to Manama's seafront, home to the avant-garde Bahrain National Theatre and Bahrain National Museum, where you can see ancient Dilmun artefacts. Nearby Manama Souq is a traditional open-air market selling spices, jewelry and perfumes, while The Avenues mall is one of the largest shopping centers in the world. At our five-star Manama hotel, the 278 rooms and suites offer free high-speed WiFi, 42-inch Smart TVs and a Sleep Advantage Program with designated Quiet Zones for maximum comfort.

name: Mashtan Bahrain
description:
Finding an ideal luxury hotel in Manama does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Mashtan Bahrain, a nice option for travelers like you.
Nearby landmarks such as La Fontaine centre of contemporary art (0.6 mi) and Ahmed Al Fateh Islamic Center (1.8 mi) make Mashtan Bahrain a great place to stay when visiting Manama.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk, and Mashtan Bahrain Hotel makes getting online easy as internet access is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service and a coffee shop. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit.
Manama has plenty of Korean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Arirang Edo Restaurant, Han Kook Kwan Korean Restaurant, BBQ & Grill, and Da Rae Jung, which are serving up some great dishes.
Manama is also home to Water Garden, a popular garden that is not too far from Mashtan Bahrain.
Mashtan Bahrain looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Manama.

name: Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara
description: A beachfront oasis that is the first luxury villa resort in Salalah, Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara offers an exhilarating escape to Oman’s rich heritage and hospitality. Opulently designed to reflect the iconic Middle Eastern fortresses, the resort embodies striking Arabian-inspired features combined with towering palms and the scenic beach. The resort is within reach of abundance of natural wonders and cultural gems whilst also located close to the airport and all sightseeing highlights. The luxury accommodation offer a mix of 136 keys including 30 standard rooms, 10 junior suites, 8 villas and 88 private pool villas. Each accommodation type will feature an amazing view of the lush garden or lagoon or the pristine beach. Guestrooms are equipped with interactive LED TV and media hub, coffee and tea making facilities, separate bathtub and rain shower, walk-in dressing room, internet access, 24-hour room service and in-room safe. The villas feature living quarters, each generously spaced out to ensure maximum privacy and seclusion. Three restaurant and lounge venues offer unique culinary experiences: Sakalan, the themed buffet restaurant with live cooking stations; Al Mina, the Mediterranean beachside restaurant and bar where guests can enjoy zesty flavours while enjoying the view of the pool and beach; and Mekong, the resort’s signature restaurant serving delectable Asian specialty cuisines. The resort has a team of passionately dedicated and knowledgeable hosts and ‘gurus’ to deliver customer centric service and outstanding attention to detail. Culture aficionados can take part in historical and cultural tours, foodies can participate in Spice spoons cooking classes; and spa lovers can indulge in Razul treatment rooms and the first hamman in Salalah. Extensive facilities include outdoor infinity pool, fitness centre, tennis court, and teens and kids club. Bespoke activities and excursions are available for guests to enjoy.

name: Atana Musandam Resort
description: Atana Musandam Resort is a novel member of LVX Preferred Hotels & Resorts, Upscale Luxury with Local Flair, known for its sun-drenched swimming pool and boutique vibes are just two of the main draws of the four-star, 105-room Atana Musandam. Located in the sleepy Musandam Peninsula and dubbed the "Norway of Arabia," thanks to its fjord-like inlets and aquamarine waters, this coastal hideaway makes for an exquisite retreat from ordinary life. After an exciting day of exploration, you can return to your warm and welcoming room of subtle Omani styling. *Catch a sunrise from your private balcony or terrace *Watch your kids play in the children’s pool and shaded playground *Ride an Omani Dhow cruising the sea coast in the Strait of Hormuz *Scuba & Snorkelling to unlock the hidden beauty of the underwaters *Ports of Call Tours *Take a Mountain Safari to Jabal Harim *Take a dolphin-watching cruise around the breathtaking fjords *Rejuvenate in the spa with an aromatherapy massage *Feast on fresh Omani lobster at on-site eatery Al Mawra *Head out on a fishing trip and catch your own seafood dinner Whether you want to simply recharge in the sunshine or immerse yourself in the culture and landscape of Oman, one deep breath of fresh Musandam Peninsula air puts you in instant vacation mode. Evenings are just as relaxing with the gentle sounds of an oud player accompanying your dinner.

name: Anantara Al Jabal Al Akhdar Resort
description: Perched 2,000 metres above sea level on the curving rim of a great canyon, the resort is a secluded haven for the intrepid and discerning. Discover a cultured treasury of authentic indulgences and immersions in the destination’s rich heritage. The arrival experience takes guests on an adventurous drive – two hours from Muscat International Airport or four and half hours from Dubai – past date plantations, dry riverbeds known locally as wadis, and historical forts. The resort echoes this fortified architecture, placing guests in modern ramparts inspired by the commanding indigenous citadels and re-imagined with sophisticated contemporary interiors. A total of 115 luxury rooms and pool villas overlook either the dramatic canyon or tranquil gardens and a spa-like bathroom complete with a rain shower. Luxury villas grant guests an intimate escape each with personal villa host services and a private infinity pool overlooking the cliffs or hidden in an exotic garden. Each villa features state-of-the-art interactive LED IPTVs and spacious walk-in dressing areas, all adding to a sense of sublime luxury. A selection of six dining venues to choose from, Al Qalaa a fine dining Arabian grill concept, Bella Vista a Roman inspired restaurant overlooking the grand canyon, Al Maisan all day dining serving world classics and cooking classes or Al Baha the café deli situated in the open air courtyard. Celebrate on Diana’s Point platform with a unique private dining experience overlooking the canyons. A cliff-edge infinity pool, two Jacuzzis, children’s pool, state-of-the-art Fitness Centre and tennis court are available to enjoy. The Anantara Spa harnesses the essence of Arabia complete with a Hammam and private outdoor relaxation areas and separate male and female indoor swimming pools. The kids’ and teens’ club offers fun-filled activities for all ages. The resort presents travellers with authentic experiences, allowing them to explore the nearby culture, history and landscape. Activities include Via Ferrata, hiking, cultural tours, abseiling, mountain climbing, archery and mountain biking. Those looking to immerse themselves in the captivating traditions of Oman can visit the mountainside ancient villages and nearby heritage sites or take part in Omani cookery lessons, part of Anantara’s signature Spice Spoons series.

name: Jebel Shams Resort
description: Jebel Shams Resort is located in the Wilayat of Al Hamra which is part of the Ancient city of NIZWA. The Resort is built atop of the highest peak in Oman. Jebel Shams is known as "The Mountain of The Sun" and rises to an altitude of 3000 metres. The most amazing sunsets can be experienced from here. A 4 x 4 vehicle is the recommended form of transport to reach our location and takes approximately 40 minutes to ascend from the nearest town of AL-Hamra. The area is home to weavers of heavy woolen rugs in distinctive colours and geometric designs. The views of the Grand Canyon from Jebel Shams Resort are amazing, ideally situated just minutes walk away from the Canyon and some fabulous Trekking and Mountain Biking, just some activities available to our guests. The temperature in Summer is ideal, usually around 30 degrees Celcius, which makes it an ideal place for a weekend break from the heat of the city's of Muscat and elsewhere for weekend breaks or a great place to explore for visitors around the Globe. Please come and visit us at our retreat and enjoy a wonderful welcome from our staff and take in the fascinating view of the Grand Canyon and the entire plateau.

name: Misfah Old House
description: Misfah Old House is in the middle of the old village of Misfat Al Abryeen in Sultanat of where local people are mainly farmers. Our Misfah Old House is about 220 km far from Muscat airport and it is very easy to reach. It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Also please be kind and inform the guest that:Smoking is not allowed inside the house ( ask for the smoking area )Alcoholic drinks are not allowed at all by Oman Government lawPlease make sure you wear decent clothes in the villageCarry small luggage for the stay in the house only as they have to walk for 5min to get to the houseCheck In time should be before 5 pm as you need to walk for almost 5 min to the house so better doing it in the day light :)

name: Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House
description:
See why so many travelers make Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House their small hotel of choice when visiting Al Khobar. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Al Khobar's most popular landmarks, such as Shaikh Mohammad bin Ibrahim Masjid (2.4 mi) and Corniche (3.0 mi), Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House provide air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a seating area, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House guests have access to room service. Need a place to park? Parking is available at Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House.
While in Al Khobar, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House, including Vicoli Lounge (1.1 mi), Primavera Restaurant (0.2 mi), and Marrakesh Restaurant (0.2 mi).
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular science museums such as Scitech Technology Center.
At Mawasim Al Sharqiyah House, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Al Khobar.

name: Arabian Nights Resort & Spa
description: Arabian Nights Resort and Spa is located away from the hustle and bustle of the city, on the Al Shariqah Sands. This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

name: Atana Stay Al Ashkara
description: Sit back, laze around and soak up the cool beachfront breeze. Chat with local fisherman, have coffee with the village shopkeeper and find out more about the art of navigating dows. Make Your Own Story. The beauty of the endless sandy beaches, the gently lapping waves, and light breezes blowing off the Indian Ocean - Atana Stay Al Ashkara welcomes stayers roaming Oman’s wonderful coast. Located in Ash Sharqiyah, where the Wahiba Sands meet the Indian Ocean, blessed with a pleasant microclimate of surprisingly milder temperatures, this pristine beach is where you will find your hip and funky place to rest. Al Ashkara is 30 minutes drive from the Ras al-Jinz Turtle Reserve, and a 4-hour cruise from Muscat most of it on a scenic coastal highway. The transformed property re-opened in July 2019 as a stylish 3-star hotel. It exudes a cool casual vibe with contemporary pops of color and style, wall art in the suites and a central hub serving as living room, restaurant, meeting place and retreat while enjoying a cup of java or a meal. It is where you can meet fellow travellers and where chapters in your Omani story.

name: Crowne Plaza Duqm, An IHG Hotel
description: A beachfront hotel for business and leisure by Duqm Port Every room has a sea view at the Crowne Plaza® Duqm hotel. Situated midway between Salalah and Muscat on the beautiful coast of Oman, it is less than 10 km from the fast-developing commercial and industrial hub of Duqm. Business travelers can host meetings in four state-of-the-art conference rooms, a prestigious executive boardroom and two magnificent ballrooms with the support of a Crowne Meetings Director. To relax, join colleagues for tennis in the superb Fitness Center, or for a night of karaoke at The Frontier Restaurant and Sports Pub. Wi-Fi and parking are complimentary for hotel guests. description: The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Wingo House Of Wings - Kuwait City
Mais Alghanim
description: The history of Mais Alghanim Restaurant dates back to the previous century when our founding father Edmond Barakat (Abu Emile), opened a canteen for the employees of Yusuf Ahmed Alghanim & Sons Co., called “Mess Alghanim”.Over time, strong ties and personal relations grew between Abu Emile, Kuwaiti, and Expatriate Families extending over three phases and three generations. The first phase commenced in 1953 during which complete meals and take-away services were offered transforming the canteen into a restaurant for one and all.In 1974, Emile Barakat (Abu Edmond) presided over the business from his late father marking the beginning of the second phase. Under his leadership, the restaurant moved to the old Kuwait television station in 1987 where it was registered at the Ministry of Commerce and Industry in the name of Yusuf Ahmed Alghanim & Sons Co. It was at this time that the name was changed from“Mess Alghanim” to “Mais Alghanim”.Abu Edmond’s vision brought Mais Alghanim forward into the beginning of the third phase in 2003, to its present location, a building of true traditional Kuwaiti design, preserving the heritage and genuine tradition. With further development of this phase, Mais Alghanim continued the journey of hospitality by opening its doors to welcome guests at a new location in Mahboula in 2010.Hence, after more than 50 years of successful service, the late Abu Edmond’s brothers and eldest son continue to welcome you with the same spirit through Generations of Genuine Hospitality, and Good Food

name: Bahay Kubo Bahrain
description: With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

name: Dirty Al's
description:
About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.
